roleset.name: spin the wheels
roleset.note: WHEELSPIN-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from wheelspin.01-v)

role.descr: thing wheelspun (us. vehicle or specific wheels)

example.name: Args 0 and 2
example.text: They were returned early today by my mum and my brother who decided to have them overnight and then take them to a lamb petting day -LRB- I ca nt go being rather pregnant -RRB- , my brother s parting words were ' [i] m about a minute away from chinning them , wheel spinning over their lifeless bodies and leaving them a rough sketch of the way home '

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: I found the keys and wheelspun the bike out of the bog back onto safe ground.
